name: Report on Compliance (ROC)
description: Full onsite assessment verifying compliance with all PCI DSS requirements.

name: SAQ A
description: Card-not-present merchants (e-commerce/mail/telephone) that have fully outsourced all cardholder data functions to compliant service providers.

name: SAQ A-EP
description: E-commerce merchants who outsource all payment processing to PCI DSS validated third parties
target_audience: and who have a website(s) that doesnâ€™t receive cardholder data but that can impact the security of the payment transaction.

name: SAQ B
description: Merchants using only imprint machines or standalone
target_audience: dial-out terminals with no electronic cardholder data storage.

name: SAQ B-IP
target_audience: PTS-approved payment terminals with an IP connection to the payment processor
column5: with no electronic cardholder data storage.

name: SAQ C-VT
description: Merchants who manually enter a single transaction at a time via a keyboard into an Internet-based virtual terminal solution.

name: SAQ C
description: Merchants with payment application systems connected to the Internet

name: SAQ D (Merchant)
description: All merchants not included in descriptions for the above SAQ types.

name: SAQ D (Service Provider)
description: Service providers defined by a payment brand as eligible to complete a Self-Assessment Questionnaire.
